instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3435 air trackpad and keyboard works only in boot menu
threads.message:
trackpad and keyboard works only in boot menu

SMC , PRAM reset done. USB ports working, usb keyboard mouse works, i can boot from ext hdd, but same issue, customer said they replaced trackpad trackpad cable, i happen to have the same working board, that works fine, so it is a board issue for sure. I dont see water damage.

threads.title: 820-3435 air trackpad and keyboard works only in boot menu
threads.message: screen backlight wont turn off when i close the lid

threads.title: 820-3435 air trackpad and keyboard works only in boot menu
threads.message:
i found a missing component, it was desoldered and removed, also there was glue around it originally, that was removed too, so Q4860 connecting to TPAD_SPI_CS_CONN_L was removed intentionally.
Now the trackpad and keyboard works in osx, but the fan is spinning fast, i guess it cant read the touchpad temp sensor, i will check that, and still wont sleep when the lid is closed

threads.title: 820-3435 air trackpad and keyboard works only in boot menu
threads.message: i fully assembled it, now the fan is ok, maybe the wifi card was missing for it, so there is only one issue, it wont go to sleep when lid is closed

threads.title: 820-3435 air trackpad and keyboard works only in boot menu
threads.message: The lid sensor is on I/O board, this could be a bad I/O board or cable, inspect both for water damage also the connector on LB....
